meanings.sent1: She enjoys presolving puzzles before anyone else.
meanings.sent2: He always presolves the math problems to save time.
meanings.sent3: The detective presolved the case and surprised everyone with the solution.
meanings.sent4: His presolving skills were like having a crystal ball for predicting outcomes.
meanings.sent5: Presolving the maze in his mind, he confidently took the first step.

meanings.definition: The act of solving or resolving beforehand.
meanings.sent1: Presolving is a helpful strategy in problem-solving.
meanings.sent2: The presolving of issues prevented any major conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The presolving of the mystery made the movie even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her presolving ability was like having a superpower in planning.
meanings.sent5: The presolving of the riddle left everyone in awe of her intelligence.
